body:
Hi Ernesto, this error means that Python 0.5.101 is not installed, but is necessary to run LadyBug. Can you make sure that you install it, by following the installation instructions that are available from the place where you downloaded the file? If you experience any issue while installing, please let me know, Thanks, Giulio
--
Giulio Piacentino
for Robert McNeel & Associates
giulio@mcneel.com
